original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 24.6. Hetuduka, Mahantaraduka
analyzed: hetuduka mahantaraduka

original: Nahetuṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca hetu sārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

analyzed: na hetum na no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca na hetu no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

original: Nahetuṁ naupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na upādā dhammam paṭicca na hetu upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nanoupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na no upādāḥ dhammam paṭicca hetu no upādāḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naupādinno dhammo hetussa upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na hetum na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte
analyzed: saṅkhitta ārammaṇe nava anantare samanantare nava upanissaye nava purejāte

original: tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, āhāre ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: tīṇi kamme tīṇi āhāre ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, sahajāte nissaye kamme …pe… magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na hetu anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi sahajāte nissaye kamme pe magge vippayutte atthiyāḥ avigate tīṇi
